name: FreeJump10
description:
Clear a gate every 10 seconds!

Built as a Summer Game Jam project for the VR Center in Asheville.

Enjoy this Ski Free inspired downhill spree. Lean left and right to move and hit a jump every 10 seconds or time is up. Let me know what you think and post pics of your greatest distances in the comments!

I love making games want to create more for you to enjoy. If you liked this game and can toss a coin or two my way, I would so appreciate it!
